title: Quickest Customs Clearance for Exports
description: In 2019, Albania had one of the fastest customs clearance times for exports, averaging just 1.1 days.

title: Most Frequent Tax Official Meetings
description: In 2019, 93.2% of firms in Albania reported having visits or meetings with tax officials, the highest percentage globally.

title: Fewest Patent Applications by Nonresidents
description: In 2021, Albania had only 1 patent application by nonresidents, one of the lowest numbers worldwide.

title: Lowest Demand for Family Planning Met by Modern Methods
description: In 2018, only 6% of married women in Albania with a demand for family planning had their needs satisfied by modern methods, one of the lowest rates globally.
